abstract: Baseball Roundup; Cleveland Indians defeat Tampa Bay Rays, 7-1; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland rookie Cody Anderson did not allow a base runner until giving up a home run and a single.

headline.main: Rookie Takes Perfect Game Into 7th Inning as the Indians Win
headline.print_headline: Rookie Takes Perfect Game Into 7th Inning as the Indians Win

snippet: The Cleveland rookie Cody Anderson did not allow a base runner until giving up a home run and a single.
